question: What paper investigated the effect of the relative position (closer or further away) of the most pertinent retrieved code snippets on repository-level code completion performance?
answer_format: Your answer should be the title of the paper WITHOUT ANY EXPLANATION.

eval_kwargs.question: What paper investigated the effect of the relative position (closer or further away) of the most pertinent retrieved code snippets on repository-level code completion performance?
eval_kwargs.reference_answer: RepoBench: Benchmarking Repository-Level Code Auto-Completion Systems
